channel.title: Hook ideas

item.title: Hook ideas
item.dc:creator: @Repentless Repentless
item.description:
@Repentless wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:18, topic:114213”][quote author=Repentless link=topic=163354.msg1622945#msg1622945 date=1185213505]
In my previous posts, I had no idea what I was doing.

Now, I somewhat know what I am doing (not quite there yet).

As spel said, a lot of those hooks are still broken. Still learning to fix a lot of them.

And tbh, there would be a lot more educated people around here if people would help them instead of flame them.
[/quote]
Where in this post have you asked for help lol? Tbh, you didn’t ask for help, you asked for flame :D.

But well done for attempting to hook things.[/quote]

What I meant was that people shouldn’t go out of their way to look for excuses to flame people. But whatever, back on topic.

Read full topic

[quote=“frank_, post:13, topic:114213”][quote author=Repentless link=topic=163354.msg1619340#msg1619340 date=1185072515]

.....

You have more than me
[/quote]who did you steal those from?

[quote author=Repentless link=topic=163354.msg1619340#msg1619340 date=1185072515]
You don’t share hooks do you? Or are these for ARGA only and too good to be shared with anyone? XD
[/quote]i sure as hell hope they dont share any hooks[/quote]

I didn’t steal them, I originally got them from spel, now I’m trying to do a shitty job of updating them, seeing as I just got in to Java

And there’s nothing wrong with sharing?

Thank you, frank, for your kind words and encouragement.

item.title: Hook ideas
item.dc:creator: @Repentless Repentless
item.description:
@Repentless wrote:

You don’t share hooks do you? Or are these for ARGA only and too good to be shared with anyone? XD

[464 Client Hooks]
getBytes injected -> he.F to class he
getNPCCount injected -> we.l to class client
getNPCArray injected -> q.D to class client
getNPCValidArray injected -> ib.yc to class client
getDefinition injected -> rb.Sc to class rb
getName injected -> ba.tb to class ba
getType injected -> ba.Bb to class ba
getValidPlayerArray injected -> ub.eb to class client
getPlayerArray injected -> gf.qb to class client
getPlayerCount injected -> ke.ub to class client
getName injected -> d.dd to class d
getCharacterMessage injected -> fb.rc to class fb
getAnimation injected -> fb.xc to class fb
isMoving injected -> fb.Ab to class fb
getMinimapInt1 injected -> ja.q to class client
getMinimapInt2 injected -> na.j to class client
getMinimapInt3 injected -> fd.tb to class client
getCurrentHP injected -> fb.fc to class fb
getMaximumHP injected -> fb.ic to class fb
getHeight injected -> fb.Cc to class fb
Character class is fb
getLoopCycle injected -> fb.tc to class fb
getLoopCycleStatus injected -> ac.L to class client
getMyPlayer injected -> pd.U to class client
getXLocation injected -> fb.Ub to class fb
getBaseX injected -> bc.s to class client
getYLocation injected -> fb.Tb to class fb
getBaseY injected -> je.Hb to class client
getY injected -> fb.nc to class fb
getX injected -> fb.qc to class fb
getSettingsArray injected -> ja.x to class client
getTerrainInt injected -> wd.a to class client
getGroundIntArray injected -> ub.N to class client
getLoginIndex injected -> pa.s to class client
getCameraCurveX injected -> ne.yb to class client
getCameraCurveY injected -> fc.ib to class client
getSkillExperiencesMax injected -> jd.p to class client
getSkillMaxes injected -> ja.D to class client
getSkillLevels injected -> vc.A to class client
getSkillExperiences injected -> md.s to class client
getWorldControllerInstance injected -> ke.Cb to class client
getGroundArray injected -> td.O to class td
getObject5Array injected -> db.W to class db
getObject2 injected -> db.L to class db
getObject4 injected -> db.X to class db
getObject1 injected -> db.eb to class db
getUID injected -> tc.d to class tc
getUID injected -> ha.d to class ha
getUID injected -> tb.x to class tb
getUID injected -> re.w to class re
getID injected -> ad.m to class ad
getNext injected -> ad.q to class ad
getPrev injected -> ad.l to class ad
getCanvas injected -> ka.Yb to class client
getInterfaceCache injected -> ic.a to class client
getInterfaceType injected -> nc.fd to class nc
getText injected -> nc.bb to class nc
getSelectedActionName injected -> nc.zb to class nc
getSpellName injected -> nc.bc to class nc
getTooltip injected -> nc.ld to class nc
getInventoryStackArray injected -> nc.pc to class nc
getInventoryArray injected -> nc.Eb to class nc
getWidth injected -> nc.Tc to class nc
getHeight injected -> nc.Tc to class nc
getMediaID injected -> nc.nb to class nc
getMediaID injected -> nc.Q to class nc
getMouseX injected -> i.X to class client
getMouseY injected -> ac.F to class client

You have more than me

EDIT: Btw link in sig doesn’t work. I wanted to see the vid Actually, I’ve been trying to get in to the ARGA community for ages.

Read full topic

item.title: Hook ideas
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:6, topic:114213”]the repaint methods

Graphics g = canvas.getGraphics();
Class60.method45(erffdgfhfkhjsgjdfglfjkjgsd);
Bot.mainScreenRepainted(g);

not so good for autoing, but i used it to make a hp above heads with bcel
theres about 7 differant places where it getGraphics() they all draw differant parts of the screen, i dont know how you can tell them apart, i just commented them out and saw what was missing, then zkm change log and you’re laughing[/quote]

Adam already did those i think. =).

Read full topic

item.title: Hook ideas
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

the repaint methods

Graphics g = canvas.getGraphics();
Class60.method45(erffdgfhfkhjsgjdfglfjkjgsd);
Bot.mainScreenRepainted(g);

not so good for autoing, but i used it to make a hp above heads with bcel
theres about 7 differant places where it getGraphics() they all draw differant parts of the screen, i dont know how you can tell them apart, i just commented them out and saw what was missing, then zkm change log and you’re laughing

Read full topic
